name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+
summary: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+ is an arcade video game inspired by the Wangan Midnight manga. Serving as the second upgrade to the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 arcade series, following Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX, it is the fifth installment in the overall Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series.
